text.name: sys_description
text.text: The Pico-8 is a virtual machine, which gives life to a "fantasy console" which has never physically existed, but which nevertheless has its own technical limitations. The graphic display is limited to 16 colors in 128x128 pixels and the sound is safe 4 channels. Which easily gives games a minimalist and retro look. The goal of the project is to offer the possibility of easily developing in LUA with an environment allowing to very easily create the different elements of the game such as sounds, sprites, maps, etc. The most famous game created on this platform was "Celste".
